title: Runes for Tanks
body:
I just wanted to know, what is the most basic and/or generic rune page to have for tank?

Any help would be appreciated

replies.body:
My preferred Rune Page: Hybrid/Magic Pen Marks, Armor/Level Seals, MR/Level Glyphs, % Max HP Quints.

Note that this is for the likes of Mundo, Zac, etc and not Juggernauts like Gnar or Darius.
never get % Max HP, it's not worth it.
I can't help but think you're saying this from a monetary standpoint. i.e. 'I still don't have all the champions, so why waste 6k IP on a few quints.'

I am saying from a monetary standpoint but also gameplay, rarely do you need %HP runes for most people. Scaling HP or HP Flats are so much better for your early and late game. I'm not really putting research into this but all quints go into 4.5% extra hp.

 the resolve mastery had the same mastery for it but removed due to the purpose of not serving its purpose for that extra tank, I think these quints are pretty much situational and should not be used most of the time unless you go like 5 warmogs Zac.

Thing is, though, all the Quints for Tanks like Zac and Mundo are pretty situational because nothing is really any better than the other. Your other real options are Magic Pen (to benefit the % Damage on Cleaver spam and what not that a lot of Magic Damage Tanks deal), Armor, MR or % HP. I just happen to take % HP out of habit and comfort.

Considering Maokai, Zac and Mundo all heal for a % of their HP, it's a very viable Quint on them.

do u even lyk maths br0. late game %hp is the most gold efficient rune in the game....and with games going faster and more ambient gold overall, its easier to get a higher hp value towards late game. just dont fight as much in the early game and you'll be unstoppable
It is worth it depending on the champion, and considering a lot of champs scale based off the % health you have.
For Juggernauts, I'd probably use my standard ad/ap rune page. I am looking for ideas for runes for champs such as Mundo, Voli, etc, So thanks for these.
im generic, either flat ad marks for 8.5 ad, or pen depending on that champs main damage output, flat/scaling armor seals, flat armor quints and 4/5 flat/scale glyphs

For a game where I'll primarily need armour, I take AD Marks, Armour/lvl Seals, MR/lvl Glyphs and Armour Quints.

For a game where I'll primarily need mres, I take AD Marks, Health/lvl Seals, MR/lvl Glyphs and MR Quints.

Depending on who you're playing and what you're playing against you can replace Marks with penetration, Seals with scaling health and Quints with %health.

My runes for Mundo (a tank) are as follow:

9 x Hybrid Marks, 9 x Scaling Health Seals, 6 x Flat CDR Glyphs, 3 x Scaling MR Glyphs, 3 x Movement Speed Quints. Runes depend on the amount of pages u have I have 16 of them and way too many runes :)
I only have 7, with one of them coming to be for tanks, in general

If your aiming to not use extra rune pages, just use a stock standard AD/AP one, masteries matter more for tanks.

And tank pages tend to change on a few factors anyway (Are you AP/AD, are you stacking only one resistance, can you give up a resistance for health/CDR etc.)

Stock Standard no resistance's (Seals/Glyphs, i don't recommend doing both, this is just to show it.):
Anything Marks.
Health Per Level Seals
CDR per Level Glyphs
Anything Quints.

Late Game resisting;
Anything Marks
Armor per level Seals
MR per level Glyphs
Anything Quints.

Probably the biggest thing with making a "tank" page is knowing what tanks you are trying to limit down onto (and how much IP you have sitting around to make this page.)

I use the following pages.

Tank page 1:
AD Marks / AP Marks
Armour Seals
MR per level Glyph's
Armour Quints

Tank Page 2:
AD Marks / AP Marks
HP per level Seals
MR per level Glyph's
%HP Quints

Tank Page 3:
Armour Pen Marks
Armour Seals
MR per level Glyph's
AD Quints

Also have variations of the above replacing some of the MR per level Glyph's with CDR Glyph's to get 5%.

Not saying they are the best they are just _what I have chosen_ to use.
I might use a variation of all 3, since I only have enough pages for one Tank. Thanks anyways! :)
